seo.title: Privacy Policy
seo.description: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. Learn how we collect, use, and share your information.

section1Intro: When you use our booking form, we collect:
section1Items: Date and time of the service
Any message you choose to provide
section2Items: Communicate with you about your reservation or enquiries
Improve our services and customer experience
section2End: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
section3Text: We process your data based on your request to receive our services and our legitimate interest in operating our business. We keep booking records only as long as necessary for providing the service, handling questions, accounting, and legal requirements.
section4Items: Our drivers and service partners, only when needed to fulfil your booking
Service providers who help us operate this website or email services
Public authorities if required by law.
section4End: All such parties are required to keep your data confidential and secure.
section5Text: This website may use cookies or similar technologies to improve performance and analyse traffic. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling them may affect some website features.
section6Text: We take reasonable technical and organisational measures to protect your personal data from loss, misuse, or unauthorised access.
section7Intro: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
section7Items: Access the personal data we hold about you
Request correction or deletion of your data
Object to or restrict certain types of processing
Withdraw consent, where processing is based on consent.
section7End: To exercise these rights, contact us using the details below.
section8Text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last updated" date.
section9Intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact:
